# FW-Components Docs Simple component-based framework for web applications. ## Main idea Sometimes we need to create simple web applications based on components like buttons, lists, forms, etc. Most of these components we reuse many times. Usually, frameworks allow you to use components such as page pieces, snippets or just dynamic templates. FWC allows you to create independent components in Borland/Embarcadero VLC style and construct pages with custom tags for components. You can understand how convenient this is from the examples below. ## Components Native: * Holder * Page * StateView * TemplateLoader * Image * Caption * Number selector * Slider * Scroll listener Bootstraped: * Button * PrimaryButton * FormGroup * ProgressBar * TextInput * Checkbox * CaptionedBox * BadgesList * FoldableBox * FaqSlide Components with third party modules: * Markdown ## Examples Click me Click me2 Click me3
